name: GothicVania
description:
Controls:

Move Left: A

Move Right: D 

 Jump: Space 

 Melee Attack: J 

 Range Attack: i

Dash: L

When you dash you are invulnerable, as rolling in Dark Souls.

This is just a simple prototype to test the mechanics and if the idea is fun and interesting.

Please leave your feedback below
